voices.label: Raquel (Portugal)
voices.name: Microsoft Raquel Online (Natural) - Portuguese (Portugal)
voices.note: This voice is pre-loaded in Edge on desktop. Unlike some of the other voices ranked at the top of that list, it's not available to be installed on Windows yet.

voices.label: Duarte (Portugal)
voices.name: Microsoft Duarte Online (Natural) - Portuguese (Portugal)
voices.note: This voice is pre-loaded in Edge on desktop. Unlike some of the other voices ranked at the top of that list, it's not available to be installed on Windows yet.

voices.label: Francisca (Brasil)
voices.name: Microsoft Francisca Online (Natural) - Portuguese (Brazil)
voices.note: This voice is pre-loaded in Edge on desktop. In other browsers, it requires the user to run Windows 11 and install the voice pack.

voices.label: Thalita (Brasil)
voices.name: Microsoft Thalita Online (Natural) - Portuguese (Brazil)
voices.note: This voice is pre-loaded in Edge on desktop. Unlike some of the other voices ranked at the top of that list, it's not available to be installed on Windows yet.

voices.label: Antonio (Brasil)
voices.name: Microsoft Francisca Online (Natural) - Portuguese (Brazil)
voices.note: This voice is pre-loaded in Edge on desktop. In other browsers, it requires the user to run Windows 11 and install the voice pack.

voices.label: Voz Google (Brasil)
voices.name: Google português do Brasil
voices.note: This voice is pre-loaded in Chrome on desktop. Utterances that are longer than 14 seconds long can trigger a bug with this voice, check the notes in the project's README for more information.

voices.label: Helia (Portugal)
voices.name: Microsoft Helia - Portuguese (Portugal)
voices.note: This voices is pre-loaded in Windows 10 and 11. While it's nowhere nearly as good as Microsoft's Natural Voices, it's good to have this voice listed as a fallback

voices.label: Maria (Brasil)
voices.name: Microsoft Maria - Portuguese (Brazil)
voices.note: This voices is pre-loaded in Windows 10 and 11. While it's nowhere nearly as good as Microsoft's Natural Voices, it's good to have this voice listed as a fallback

voices.label: Daniel (Brasil)
voices.name: Microsoft Daniel - Portuguese (Brazil)
voices.note: This voices is pre-loaded in Windows 10 and 11. While it's nowhere nearly as good as Microsoft's Natural Voices, it's good to have this voice listed as a fallback

voices.label: Voz do Portugal
voices.name: português Portugal
voices.note: On Android, voice selection is only supported at a system level and Web Speech API doesn't return a true list of voices available, just a list of languages and regions

voices.label: Voz do Brasil
voices.name: português Brasil
voices.note: On Android, voice selection is only supported at a system level and Web Speech API doesn't return a true list of voices available, just a list of languages and regions
